io.netty.handler.ipfilter

类 IpSubnetFilterRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.ipfilter.IpSubnetFilterRule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IpFilterRule

    public final class IpSubnetFilterRule
extends Object
implements IpFilterRule
    Use this class to create rules for RuleBasedIpFilter that group IP addresses into subnets. Supports both, IPv4 and IPv6.

    • 方法详细资料

      • matches

        public boolean matches(InetSocketAddress remoteAddress)
        指定者:
        matches 在接口中 IpFilterRule
        返回:
        This method should return true if remoteAddress is valid according to your criteria. False otherwise.

      • ruleType

        public IpFilterRuleType ruleType()
        指定者:
        ruleType 在接口中 IpFilterRule
        返回:
        This method should return IpFilterRuleType.ACCEPT if all IpFilterRule.matches(InetSocketAddress) for which IpFilterRule.matches(InetSocketAddress) returns true should the accepted. If you want to exclude all of those IP addresses then IpFilterRuleType.REJECT should be returned.
